description:
Everything you need to enter the world of cruisy bike lanes, urban excursions, and living the good life on two wheels. At the heart of the Chinook lies a solid aluminum frame that blends comfortable geometry with a responsive ride. Wide yet smooth 35mm tires roll fast, but won't feel sketchy on gravel or dirt roads. On damp days or wintry commutes, you'll appreciate the consistent braking power that comes with disc brakes. We've opted for a selection of Shimano® components and a wide range of gears to keep shifting smooth whether you're churning up hills or cruising country roads.

  • Durable 6061-series aluminum frame with butted tubes reduces overall weight
  • 700 x 35mm Kenda Trekking tires roll fast yet are durable enough to handle dirt roads and light trail use
  • Tektro Novela disc brakes provide good stopping power regardless of weather
  • Wide gearing suits everything from steep hills to fun descents
  • Upright seated position and riser bars provide plenty of comfort
  • Flat MEC Moss pedals are easy to use
  • Women's-specific saddle is ergonomically designed for comfort
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • MEC bikes are designed in Canada. Everything from the frames to the graphics is developed at the MEC Head Office in Vancouver, BC
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: MEC Chinook Step-Through Bicycle - Unisex
